Use the following generation settings:

Tone: Write in a neutral, information-focused tone.Mild emphasis is allowed to clarify relevance, but avoid emotional language, exaggeration, or persuasive phrasing.The tone should remain calm and descriptive.

generated_body: The article is likely to report on a recent incident involving a deadly shooting that occurred during a Halloween party at an Airbnb rental. The piece may detail the circumstances surrounding the event, including the location and time of the shooting, as well as the involvement of law enforcement in apprehending suspects. Additionally, it could provide insights into the broader implications of safety at short-term rental properties and community reactions to the incident. The article may also touch on the backgrounds of the arrested individuals, although specific details may vary.
